EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-08-15 Non-MQL segment 2 30-30-30 eblast.ES-2018-08-15 Non-MQL segment 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Deliver Greater Innovation and Save
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[turbonomic.com/request-a-demo]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
What would it mean for you and your IT team to have 30% better performance, 30% less cost, and 30% fewer tickets all in a 30-minute installation <[[turbonomic.com/request-a-demo]]>?
<[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo/]]>
Recently, I learned that in the first month of using Turbonomic, DXC automated decisions around placement, motion, sizing, and configuring saving them over $1.25M <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/dxc-turbonomic-partnership]]> and delivered greater innovation to their clients.
Schedule a demo <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo]]> and learn how Turbonomic in a single platform across on-premises and multi-cloud can help your IT organization assure performance, enforce policy compliance, and minimize cost in real-time.
Regards, Megan
